data.headline: Junior UX Designer and Academic Researcher
data.summary: Passionate and detail-oriented UX Designer with a strong academic background in human-computer interaction. Experienced in conducting user research, designing intuitive interfaces, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional digital experiences.

experience.title: Junior UX Designer
bullets: Conducted user research to identify pain points and user needs
Designed wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups for web and mobile applications
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless user experiences
Performed user testing and incorporated feedback to iterate on designs

projects.name: Redesign of Company's E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Conducted user research, designed a new information architecture, and created high-fidelity prototypes to improve the user experience of the company's e-commerce platform.

projects.name: Mobile App for Fitness Tracking
projects.description: Designed the user interface and interaction flow for a mobile app that helps users track their fitness activities and progress.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate is a young woman with dark hair and a friendly, confident expression. She is wearing a smart, business-casual outfit against a plain background.
